markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Munavri Spellblade](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1241)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Although the subterranean Darklands are known for their cruel and domineering civilizations—led by fiend-worshipping [drow](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=37), [urdefhans](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=158), and others—that dwell within those sinister caverns, not every such subterranean society is ruled that way. Munavris are perhaps the best example of a people that tend to treat new arrivals to their Darklands territories with good temper, fairness, and respect.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Munavri.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Munavri Spellblade](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1241)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Munavri" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=358" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 180</row>

**Perception** +7; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Munavri](/Languages.aspx?ID=68), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 30 feet (munavris only)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +4

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +0

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +3
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)** 

**Items**
[Bastard Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15), [Breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 28

**Resistances**
mental 2

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
bastard sword +8 ([two-hand d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 slashing

**Occult Spontaneous Spells** DC 17, attack +9
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334)
- **1st**
[Mindlink](/Spells.aspx?ID=195), [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220), [Soothe](/Spells.aspx?ID=291)

**Intuit Object** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** By concentrating their psychic energy on a held object, the munavri intuits its use and understands how to effectively wield it. The munavri chooses one item they are holding. They gain the trained proficiency rank in one statistic required to use that item, but only for the purpose of using that specific item. For example, they could become trained in [greatswords](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24) (to use a specific greatsword) or [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) (to use a [_jade cat_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=223) talisman). This benefit lasts for 1 hour.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-250" />
name: Munavri Spellblade

Munavris are perhaps the best example of a people that tend to treat new arrivals to their Darklands territories with good temper, fairness, and respect. The munavri chooses one item they are holding. They gain the trained proficiency rank in one statistic required to use that item, but only for the purpose of using that specific item. For example, they could become trained in greatswords (to use a specific greatsword) or Acrobatics (to use a jade cat talisman). This benefit lasts for 1 hour.
